description: A Sequencing Experiment is an investigation that consists of a coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data with the goal of verifying, falsifying, or establishing the validity of a hypothesis.

attributes.description: Key/value pairs corresponding to an entity.

items.description: A key/value pair that further characterizes an entity.

key_type.description: A semantic type that characterizes the attribute key (e.g., oxygen saturation measurement (MAXO:0000616)).

value.description: The value for an attribute (e.g., a numerical value without the units).

value_type.description: The value_type that characterizes the attribute value (e.g., percentage (SIO:001413)).

items.title: Attribute

description.description: A detailed description of this Sequencing Experiment.

title.description: The title for this Sequencing Experiment (e.g., GHGAE_PBMC_RNAseq).

type.description: The type of this Sequencing Experiment.

title: SequencingExperiment
